main event: A journalist reported seeing a cigar-shaped object over Portsmouth, Virginia, on 15 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as dull silver or gray and estimated to be 30 to 50 feet long., It zoomed down from the sky to near a TV tower and vanished within 15 to 30 seconds., The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions with high visibility., The observer was regarded as 'doubtful' by investigators., No physical evidence of the sighting was reported.
witness description: a journalist from the Public Information Office, Fifth Coast Guard District
